name: pie
actor_no_arg: You pick up a pie and toss it around for a bit.
others_no_arg: $n picks up a pie and tosses it around for a bit.
actor_found_target: You toss a pie at $N and hit $M right in the FACE!
others_found: $n tosses a pie at $N and hits $m right in the FACE!
target_found: $n tossed a pie in your face... and now you are all covered in GOO!
others_auto: $n buries $s face in the pie, licking the pan clean.
